jump_scares.spoiler: A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
A neomorph opens its mouth and violently attacks Rosenthal
Oram suddenly shoots the neomorph
The facehugger jumps out at Oram
Blood explodes out of Oram’s torso
David disables Walter
A facehugger jumps out at Cole
There is a brief cut during the opening credits where a glass capsule cracks (another cut at 2:46 where an explosion occurs may also startle viewers)
Quick cut during the sermon as the alien attempts to break out from inside the box (it finally breaks out at 29:33)
Quick cut during the sermon as the alien attempts to break out from inside the box (it finally breaks out at 29:33)
Quick cut during the sermon as the alien attempts to break out from inside the box (it finally breaks out at 29:33)
The alien suddenly spits acid in Murphy’s face
Rains sees the alien
The alien drops down on Boggs
The scene suddenly cuts to Bishop’s remains being thrown onto a table
The alien grabs Clemens through the shower curtain
The alien pulls Andrew into the vent above
The alien suddenly appears in front of an inmate as he climbs up a ladder
An alien hand bursts through the door in front of a prisoner. [Video]
The alien appears in front of an inmate
The alien suddenly leaps out of the molten lead
The alien’s tongue comes out of its mouth and slams into the glass barrier
An alien hand grabs Dr. Gediman and pulls him into the hole
A broken hose drops down and starts hissing behind Elgyn. [Video]
An apparently dead man suddenly jumps up and yells
A Face Hugger jumps on to Ripley’s face
Purvis is suddenly shot
The alien snaps at Ripley
An alien roars from behind Call
The dying alien suddenly roars at Call once more
One of the Heptapods places a tentacle on the barrier near where Louise is standing
During a dream where Louise is talking to Ian in her room, Louise looks up and Ian has been replaced by a Heptapod
The Heptapod places a tentacle on the barrier causing Louise and Ian to be pushed back by an unseen force
Something appears to move in front of the camera which is filming the two astronauts on the moon and there is a loud burst of static
The camera zooms in on Nate, who is snoring, he suddenly opens his eyes and yells (as a joke)
Ben uses his camera to light up the crater, suddenly the camera flash illuminates the corpse of one of the Russian cosmonauts
The dead cosmonauts appears to jerk violently as Ben looks through his suit
There is several loud bangs and the camera that is viewing the Russian lander suddenly tips over
Nate suddenly shatters the rock with a hammer as Ben examines it
Nate, who appears to be sleeping, suddenly grabs Ben’s arm
Nate is pulled into the crater
Nate bangs on the window of the lander just as Ben is about to launch
Nate’s head explodes
An alien creature screeches at Moses as he searches through the car, a couple of seconds later it leaps at his face
The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door
Moses looks through the peephole in the door a second time and the alien suddenly lunges at the door
The alien smashes in the recycling bin that Biggz is hiding in
The alien lunges at Biggz as he peers out of the recycling bin
The alien bangs on the lift
An alien knocks over Jerome
Jerome grabs Pest’s ankle
A dog runs towards Darrin
Darrin turns the camera and is startled by Raid
Darrin is startled by a water stream
A loud bang
Radek is suddenly pulled inside the door of the shack by an unseen creature
From a distance, we see the crocodile attempt to break out of the shack making a loud noise in the process
Lena and Dr. Ventress hear a rustling noise nearby
Sheppard is suddenly snatched away by a bear
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
The original Em suddenly appears crawling in the hallway
White Arlene is lifting the blinds up, something flies into the window
A hand hits the car window after Noah calls out to uncle Morgan
While climbing down a cube hatch, Cassandra is suddenly grabbed on the leg
The headlights of Ward’s car come on
Theresa screams “Look out!” and there is a cut to a mutilated looking G-Spot (the name of the cat) shrieking on the road
Lavinia is pulled backwards by Nathan
After calling out Lavinia’s name, there is a sudden cut to Theresa crawling towards her
Upon crawling through a passage a woman is suddenly dragged upwards
A corpse suddenly springs back up and makes a gasping noise
Whitley jumps out at his wife Anne from behind a wall to scare her as a joke
There is a sudden flash of light accompanied by a loud sound
The curtains are suddenly pulled open by alien hands
A person in a Halloween costume jumps out from behind a table
A floating robot glides into the room, followed by a cut to it quickly flying towards Whitley
Whitley suddenly jolts awake from the hypnosis and begins to scream
The house lights turn on by themselves

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

jump_scares.spoiler: America turns around and strange and Wong are standing behind her
America looks into a puddle and suddenly an eye pops out
Wanda sees a reflection of the Scarlet witch in the window
When Wong turns around a monster suddenly roars
A woman with a shield suddenly attacks Wanda coming out of the steam
A man approaches a dark hole and after a long focus on the hole Wanda suddenly pops out
As red smoke begins forming in the background there is 2 seconds of silence and then suddenly a demonic looking Wanda snaps a man’s neck
After a long focus on a door labeled “Blast door” Wanda suddenly pops out with red glowing eyes
Wanda suddenly pulls America backwards by magic force
When Christine approaches a seemingly dead evil strange his eye suddenly opens accompanied by a scare chord
After Christine opens Strange’s eye, an evil soul suddenly fly’s towards the screen
Strange’s 3rd eye suddenly opens while he screams
There is a loud explosion followed by another about 15 seconds later
A gunshot may startle some viewers
There is an explosion and sparks fly from up ahead in the tunnel
Holly screams loudly
There are several more explosions and sparks fly once more
There is an explosion and more sparks as Holly runs through the tunnel
One of the creatures appears in front of the camera
Two creatures appear behind Holly
A creature appears in front of Holly as she approaches J.P
Another creature appears as Holly opens a door
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
Some viewers may be startled by a sudden bright flash that appears on camera footage the crew are watching
A phone rings during a tense scene
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
A man is hit by a car
An apparently dead woman suddenly reaches out and grabs Pete
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid that Beaver is sitting on
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid that Beaver is sitting on
Jonesy suddenly returns to the room, startling Beaver
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
There is a loud bang on the door (followed by several more over the next 20 seconds)
A red dust erupts from the aliens head
Henry has a sharp and sudden vision of Jonesy’s possession
A truck drives into a shed, nearly running over Henry
A door opens from behind Dr. William Weir
Weir is grabbed on his shoulder from behind
Miller is startled by a floating hand that appears from behind
A disfigured face pops out from behind one of the crew members as she investigates a stuck CD
The lights flicker then Weir sees a person appear next to him
Lights explode around one of the crew members
Something bangs heavily on the door
Flashing images occur as Miller puts his head against the wall
Peters falls down a hole in the ground
D.J. gets attacked after spinning around
One of the crew member’s helmets is opened dramatically
The camera suddenly cuts from an extreme close up of Nelson’s face to a top down shot of a field (accompanied by a sound effect)
A window blind suddenly opens
Nelson turns around and Billy is standing behind him with a hockey stick
Rachel sees an image of her bloodied father in the mirror
Billy suddenly pops up in the front of the car holding a pickaxe
David suddenly knocks on the door behind Rachel
There is a sudden cut to Billy’s coffin accompanied by a sound effect
Sophia sees Courtney on the other side of the elevator
Courtney quickly opens the shower curtain during a tense scene
A coprse appears in the bathtub from under the shower curtain
A hand appears on the window of the wrecked car that Courtney is looking through
A few short cuts to the car crash may startle some viewers
Jamie’s girlfriend appears behind him briefly before the phone rings
Loud static comes out of the radio
Courtney tries to leave down the fire escape but Tessa appears in front of her
While swimming, Marlo has a flashback to her “flatlining” experience where she is floating face down in the water
Marlo looks up and sees the word “MURDERER” written on the morgue cabinet
A corpse appears behind Marlo
The radio crackles into life
All the cabinets on Jamie’s boat suddenly open
Jamie sees his ex-girlfriend
A hand reaches out and touches Jamie’s shoulder
Jamie is stabbed in the hand as he tries to climb out of the water
As the elevator door begins to close, Sophia briefly sees the girl from her class
Marlo is suddenly suffocated with a plastic bag
The corpse suddenly grabs Marlo around the throat
Marlo is suddenly lifted in the air and thrown backwards by an unseen force
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group
The child suddenly implodes, splattering black goo all over the room
Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed
Sebastian suddenly begins to spasm
A hand reaches out and touches Linda while she is sleeping
Sebastian begins to move violently
Sarah wakens suddenly
Linda’s bedroom window breaks
Invisible Sebastian suddenly starts talking directly in front of Dr. Kramer
Accompanied by a sound effect, Linda bumps into Sebastian
Through the thermal goggles Janice sees Sebastian burst through the door and attack her
A hand grabs Linda around the ankle
After a tense scene the spaceship explodes mid sentence
The sudden buzzing of an alarm clock may startle some people
Elizabeth puts her hand on Matthew’s shoulder, startling him
The mutating body suddenly opens it’s eyes
Matthew points at Nancy and lets out a scream, revealing that he has been converted into a pod person. [Video]
A hand breaks through the glass in the cell where John is staying
After waking from a dream, John looks across and sees the deformed policeman sitting beside him. [Video]
The strange cyclist appears in front of Linda while she is driving and she crashes into him
The cyclist appears behind Linda before driving off
An arm comes out from behind the door and grabs Linda on the shoulder
Linda grabs John from behind as he goes back into his room
The scene cuts to a creature making a screeching noise
Sutter Cane’s head appears beside John

A shadow walks past the screen, accompanied by a loud noise
A pig suddenly runs past the screen

A man places his bloodied hand on the back window, startling Claire

A worker is suddenly pulled into the crate

The Velociraptor pokes its head through the air duct that Lex is crawling through
The Velociraptor jumps at Lex as she is pulled back through the air duct (this is particularly effective in the 3D version)

movies.title: Kola Superdeep / The Superdeep / Кольская сверхглубокая / Kolskaya Sverhglubokaya

jump_scares.spoiler: A loud alarm blares, startling the people in the elevator
As Kira turns to look away for a moment, Olga lunges forward and bangs her head against the window
There is an explosion in the wall panel on the right
Petr suddenly fires his gun during the tense standoff
Some wiring crackles loudly behind Anna, startling her
Sudden rockfall happens in the corridor
Calvin suddenly attaches itself to Hugh’s hand
Calvin grips Hugh’s hand tighter
Calvin suddenly grabs the mouse
Calvin drops down onto Rory
Calvin jumps out of the coolant valve
Calvin moves past a window
David sees a dead body
Calvin lunges at David
A burning moose jumped in the shot
The whisperer’s mouth abruptly opens, releasing blinding lights onto John
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
The small lizard is suddenly grabbed and eaten by a different, much larger type of lizard
When Jonas looks to his left, the megalodon suddenly appears next to the submersible
Someone grabs Jonas by the shoulder
A previously unseen large eel suddenly leaps at the character’s helmet, shown from his POV
A shoal of fish startles the characters
A lizard suddenly appears in front of Jonas, shown from his POV, and lunges at him
The megalodon rams the glass wall behind the speaking character, shattering it
A megalodon suddenly appears and swallows the boat with the mercenaries
Something rams the boat, startling its passengers
The scene abruptly cuts to Corporal Bower struggling in his hyper-sleep chamber
A hyper-sleep chamber drops down, accompanied by a loud noise
Bower shines his torch on a dead person hanging by some rope. [Video]
The mystery girl attacks Bower
The hanging body is suddenly pulled up
Something runs past Bower
A monster tries to attack Bower through a grate
A child’s face appears beside Bower during a scene transition
A hanging man suddenly opens his eyes as Bower gets close to him. [Video]
The monsters start screaming from above Bower
A monster lunges at Bower
A monster jumps down on Nadia
Payton closes a cabinet door which reveals Gallo standing behind it
Metal horse gets spit out by Jean Jacket onto Oj’s car
A flock of birds fly out at Billy as he sees several flayed corpses hanging in the trees
Dillon almost runs into Mac
Blood splatters on Blaine’s shoulder
The Predator is suddenly caught in the net just as Dutch begins to turn back
Mac puts his hand over Dillon’s mouth
The Predator shoots a laser at Poncho from the trees
The Predator traps Dutch’s head between two spikes that come out of its arm
Alice gets grabbed from behind the doorway
Dr. Blue jumps down at Rain while she is fixing the power
A body falls out from behind the door
Inside a liquid-containing tank, a body wakes up abruptly
A zombie slams against the window from the other side
Hands grab through some grating on the side of the tunnel
A silhouette walks past the screen
A man with a knife suddenly lunges at Nick
As Aubrey closes the door a man runs up to it and pounds on the window pane
Aubrey closes her eyes and the screen cuts to black. A second later, the screen suddenly cuts back in to show the creature standing right above her
As Aubrey begins to doze off there is suddenly a loud flash of a woman undressing
The lights go out, and a few seconds later a red light comes on to reveal a creature standing right in front of Aubrey
While jogging, Tatyana suddenly runs into an inmate
Tatyana places her hand on the window, and the alien suddenly lunges at the glass
While reaching out to the alien, Tatyana suddenly slips on the goo on the floor and falls
The alien creature shoots a parasite into Grant
Grant suddenly jumps up and grabs Brenda
Grant suddenly appears beside Starla
A dead dog suddenly falls onto Starla. [Video]
As Starla walks past the window while on the phone, Grant can be seen watching her from outside
Starla opens the door and Grant is standing outside
Kylie runs into her mother as she tries to escape the parasite
One of the infected policemen suddenly sits up
Starla suddenly shoots one of the infected men in the head
A figure quickly moves past the camera as Bill tries to use the phone
As the crew explore the Icarus I, something dislodges from the ship and makes a loud bang
Icarus II abruptly disengages from Icarus I
Pinbacker suddenly attacks Capa
Pinbacker impales Corazon with a scalpel
An abrupt cut to Mace crying out as he climbs out of the coolant reservoir may startle some viewers
Pinbacker grunts loudly and punches through a glass wall
Cary sets off some fireworks
Mr Woodward’s hand suddenly brushes away the map that the children are looking at. [Video]
A container suddenly crashes through a fence
The window explodes behind the gas station attendant
A creature comes out of the trees and rushes at the lineman from behind
The white cube suddenly shoots through Joe’s bedroom wall
The truck that two military personnel are standing beside explodes
The military suddenly burst into the room
The alien slams into the military bus. [Video]
The alien suddenly grabs a man
An alien hand breaks through the bus
A large explosion knocks the children to the ground
Cary turns around and sees a body hanging from the ceiling
Sheriff Pruitt is suddenly grabbed by the alien
The windows of a shop suddenly break as metallic objects fly out of it
Hippy spies on the SEALs attaching the warhead to one of the remote operated vehicles. He tries to go back to warn the others but Coffey is standing right behind him
Lindsey attempts to radio for help and gets as far as “Deep Core this is Cab One we need assist…..” before sparks come out of the electronics and the power goes out
The nurse screams when she sees the blob, and loud music begins to play

After Steve goes off screen, there’s a loud sound of cans falling down
A strange shrieking noise resounds through the spaceship
Tam puts her head up to the wall, after several seconds silence we hear the shrieking noise again accompanied by a thud from the other side of the wall
A section of wall is removed to reveal a screaming woman who appears to be fused to the wiring of the space ship
The Foosball figures start to spin rapidly by themselves
Accompanied by a sound effect, Volkov’s eye moves while he is looking in the mirror
Worms suddenly burst out of Volkov’s mouth
The wall panel suddenly traps Mundy’s arm
A monster bursts through the clouds
Evan suddenly appears in the kitchen holding a knife
A bright camera flash may startle some viewers
Evan’s dad is suddenly on top of Evan strangling him
Lenny forcefully pushes Evan up against a wall
A loud gunshot interrupts a quiet scene
Aaron is about to jump off the boat to find Justin when Justin suddenly surfaces
Justin sees Carl’s body hanging from the roof when another copy of Carl suddenly starts yelling from behind him
Carl suddenly bursts through the door behind Justin
There is a loud bang and the projector is flung into the air
Carl bursts through the door
A peaceful scene is interrupted by a car driving past at speed

movies.title: The Girl with All the Gifts

jump_scares.spoiler: The sound of a door opening may startle some viewers
A child suddenly lunges at the Sergeant
An infected child attacks Kieran
A car slams into the car that Telly and Ash are in
Agent Petalis is suddenly sucked through the roof at great speed by an unseen force. [Video]
Anne Pope is sucked off the ground and disappears into the sky. [Video]
While chasing Sam, Telly runs around a corner and sees the agent standing in front of her
The agent’s face suddenly distorts and the windows around him blow out
The agent grabs Telly around the neck
The agent is sucked through the roof of the hangar
Mrs. Jones suddenly appears behind Elliot
The camera begins to shake and there is a loud bang followed by a high pitched whining noise
Niko, wearing a pig mask, suddenly appears beside Zoe
Hands appear beneath a door during a dream Zoe is having
The previously dead dog suddenly jumps up on the table and barks
Clay is startled by a loud crash coming from another room
Clay stands up and the dog barks at him, having suddenly appeared on top of the table
The dog appears directly in front of Clay
Zoe surprises Frank while he is at his computer
Frank turns around and the previously dead Zoe now appears to be sitting up underneath the sheet
The mirror in front of Zoe cracks
Zoe opens her eyes and they are black
Zoe appears behind Niko
An unseen force pushes Niko into a cabinet
One of the shrouded bodies suddenly jumps up
The lights cut out briefly, when they come back on Zoe is standing right beside Frank
The record player suddenly turns on and begins to play opera music
Zoe appears behind Eva
Frank is shocked back to life
When Cecilia flees the house, she runs into a dog bowl after she came out of the room with the suits. Although the bowl is visible, the loud bang is very shocking
After Cecilia gets into the car, her husband runs out of the forest and hits the car window
Sydney is suddenly slapped by the invisible man while talking to Cecilia
As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her
After Cecilia turns off the tap in the kitchen and looks around she is suddenly grabbed by the invisible man
The invisible man suddenly appears beside Cecilia under the trunk
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
A creature lands on the window
There is a loud clanking noise
One of the group is grabbed from behind by a man trapped in a spider web
The returning group bang on the door of the supermarket
The soldier outside the supermarket is taken away suddenly by a creature
A corpse hanging upside down suddenly drops from the trees
As Casey reaches towards a dead soldier, there is a loud bang on the window
As Casey and Quinn back away from the stairs, The Predator suddenly appears behind them
The Predator suddenly drops through the ceiling into Rory’s room
As Baxley says “That’s the stupidest fu***ng thing I’ve ever heard”, sparks fly from the tree trunk behind him as he narrowly avoids being shot
The device suddenly attaches itself to a scientists arm
When Gorr is walking slowly towards the camera, he suddenly appears closer
Gorr suddenly appears in a cage where Axl tells a story to the kidnapped Asgardian children
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes

The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect

The man with the bandaged head suddenly looks through the window at Héctor
A table is thrown at Héctor as he climbs the stairs
A daydreaming Emma is interrupted by Gracie who appears in front of her
Gracie coughs blood onto a boy
A helicopter flies overhead startling Emma
Emma looks through the letterbox flap and sees a figure move past the front door
During a tense scene Stacey’s boyfriend jumps out at Emma (as a joke)
Emma watches through a hole in the wall as a girl is attacked by an infected person
The infected boy appears in front of the peephole
A loud bang startles Stacey and Emma
Bright lights appear in front of Emma and Stacey as they drive down a dark road
Emma looks through the peephole on the front door and sees Evan’s father (who is now infected)
A figure moves past the window
There is a loud bang from outside the house
Evan’s father bursts through a window
There is a gunshot (followed by another approximately 15 seconds later)
Stacey grabs CJ and pulls him towards the opening in the wall
Stacey’s hand reaches out to grab the plate of food
Stacey wakes up as Emma attempts to pull the worm out
Evan shines the torch into a room full of infected people
An infected person lunges at Emma and Evan as they are running away
An infected person punches a hole through the door
Loud noise from silence as a man plugs in a microphone
A raccoon makes a noise
Something hits the side of Kelly & Jim’s tent

Something crashes down in the forest behind Kelly
